prompt: Some doctors don't appreciate any frivolous people
hint: Does 'some' mean 'at least one' or 'all of them'?
explanation: "Some" indicates an existential statement about at least one member. "D" refers to a class of things, so use uppercase. The predicate "A" refers to a class/property, so use uppercase. The "not" applies to the predication, indicating the subject lacks the property.
